post.description: This endpoint is used for user authentication. Users must submit a valid email and password to receive an authentication token. This token should be used to access other endpoints that require authentication.

200.description: Authentication success. The user has been authenticated and a token has been returned.

400.description: Authentication failed. The email or password provided is incorrect.

error.example: Autentikasi failed. Please check email or password.

post.description: Send a password reset token to user's email

message.example: Password reset token has been sent to your email.

patch.description: Reset user's password using the reset token
